name: Hemigrams
description:
Crossword puzzles and word searches, move aside! Hemigrams is the hip, new way to have casual fun with letters. 100 unique clues are hidden for you in six-by-six grids. You begin your Hemigrams hunt as a humble ant. What will you become?

Created for 8 Bits to Infinity's Text Only Jam 2. Programmed in Delphi RAD Studio 10.2 by Kendra Parrish with no external assets.
